'use strict';
angular.module('recruting',['ngCookies']). config(['$routeProvider',function($routeProvider) { $routeProvider.
when('/admin/response/:vacID',{templateUrl: 'partials/response.html', controller:vrShow}).
when('/admin/users',{templateUrl: 'partials/admin_users.html', controller:adminUsersCtrl}). when('/admin/user',{templateUrl: 'partials/admin_user.html', controller:adminUserCtrl}).
when('/admin/companies',{templateUrl: 'partials/admin_companies.html', controller:adminCompaniesCtrl}). when('/admin/company/:compID',{templateUrl: 'partials/admin_company.html', controller:adminCompanyCtrl}).
when('/admin/vacancies',{templateUrl: 'partials/admin_vacancies.html', controller:adminVacanciesCtrl}). when('/admin/vacancy/:vacID',{templateUrl: 'partials/admin_vacancy.html', controller:adminVacancyCtrl}).
when('/vacancies',{templateUrl: 'partials/vacancies.html', controller:vacancyCtrl}). when('/vacancy/:vacID', {templateUrl: 'partials/vacancy.html', controller:vacancyShowCtrl}). when('/company/:compID',{templateUrl: 'partials/company.html', controller:companyCtrl}). otherwise({redirectTo: '/vacancies'}); }]); /*
when('/admin',{templateUrl: 'partials/admin_vacancies.html', controller:vacancyCtrl}). when('/admin/users',{templateUrl: 'partials/admin_users.html', controller:adminUserCtrl}). // дописать создать when('/admin/companies',{templateUrl: 'partials/admin_companies.html', controller:adminCompaniesCtrl}). // дописать создать when('/admin/vacancies',{templateUrl: 'partials/admin_vacancies.html', controller:adminVacanciesCtrl}). when('/admin/vacancy/:vacID',{templateUrl: 'partials/admin_vacancies.html', controller:adminVacancyCtrl}). // дописать создать when('/admin/response/:vacID',{templateUrl: 'partials/response.html', controller:vrShow}).
when('/vacancies',{templateUrl: 'partials/vacancies.html', controller:vacancyCtrl}). when('/vacancy/:vacID', {templateUrl: 'partials/vacancy.html', controller:vacancyShowCtrl}). when('/company/:compID',{templateUrl: 'partials/company.html', controller:companyCtrl}). otherwise({redirectTo: '/vacancies'});
